mph.beans.dto

Class DeliverableDTO

  • java.lang.Object
    • mph.beans.dto.DeliverableDTO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataTransferObject, EntityDTO

    public class DeliverableDTO
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityDTO
    This class contains the information about a project deliverable.
    It implements the EntityDTO interface.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Create the deliverable DTO with the given arguments
        Parameters:
        theDeliverableId - the id of the deliverable
        theDeadline - the deliverable deadline
        theDescription - the deliverable description
        thePenalty - the penalty which will be assigned to late deliveries
